scripts.e2e: docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --wait database-e2e && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --wait lowdefy-e2e && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml run --rm playwright npx playwright test --retries=3 --reporter=list
scripts.e2e:update: docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --wait database-e2e && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --wait lowdefy-e2e && docker compose -f docker-compose.e2e.yml run --rm playwright npx playwright test --update-snapshots --reporter=list
scripts.prisma:prepare: mkdir -p prisma/migrations && cp -r ../participant/prisma/migrations prisma && cp ../participant/prisma/schema.prisma prisma && cp ../participant/prisma/seed.ts prisma
